overview: Matt Russell's older brother Vince decides that it's the perfect time for Matt to lose his innocence, so he brings over stunning hooker Angel to introduce him to the wanton world of sex. Soon, Matt has turned his parents' house into a thriving brothel, with his friends and hers hooking up for fun and profit.
tagline: When Matt's parents leave for a weekend holiday, we all get to watch some very Kinky Business.
title: Kinky Business
